Name.label: Mendelian susceptibility to mycobacterial diseases due to complete IL12RB1 deficiency
Autosomal recessive mendelian susceptibility to mycobacterial diseases due to a complete deficiency

TextSection.Contents: Mendelian susceptibility to mycobacterial diseases (MSMD) due to complete interleukin-12 receptor subunit beta-1 (IL12RB1) deficiency is a genetic variant of MSMD (see this term) characterized by mild bacillus Calmette-GuÃ©rin (BCG) infections and recurrent Salmonella infections.
